section4.q3: I would recommend SUP-002 because they have the highest on-time delivery rate and a low defect rate, which aligns with the priority on quality.
section4.q4: SUP-003 offers the best value as they have the lowest price per unit, which is beneficial for cost reduction, despite their longer lead time.
